description: This file contains Jetpack Compose UI components for the NoteEase Android app, including screens for listing, editing, and viewing note details. It defines composable functions, UI layout, and interactions related to notes.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Displays a list of notes with search, add, and refresh functionalities.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: A composable card representing a single note in the list.

methods.name: NoteEditorScreen
methods.description: Screen for creating or editing a note, including save, delete, and navigation controls.

methods.name: NoteDetailScreen
methods.description: Displays the details of a note with options to edit, delete, and share.
